mapper.sql: SELECT bd_code, bd_title,bd_user, bd_content, bd_vcount,bd_time, img_code as i_code , img_upname as i_uname, img_origin as i_origin FROM tbl_board LEFT JOIN tbl_like ON bd_code = like_cncode LEFT JOIN tbl_image ON bd_code = img_cncode where bd_code = #{bd_code}
mapper.select: SELECT bd_code, bd_title, bd_user, bd_vcount, bd_time FROM tbl_board where bd_code != 'B0000' order by bd_code DESC

SELECT bd_code, bd_title, bd_user, bd_vcount, bd_time FROM tbl_board where bd_title like concat('%',#{bd_title},'%') or bd_user like concat('%',#{bd_user},'%') or bd_content like concat('%',#{bd_content},'%') order by bd_code DESC
select max(bd_code) as bd_code from tbl_board
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(bd_code, bd_title, bd_content, bd_user, bd_time) values(#{bd_code}, #{bd_title}, #{bd_content}, #{bd_user}, #{bd_time})
